sentences.english: Under the match of dark set, once one day inside sweep two records of counties.
sentences.chinese: 在暗组的配合下，曾有一天之内横扫两个县的记录。

sentences.english: All other metals and nonmetals lie within the boundaries of lead and diamond.
sentences.chinese: 所有其他金属和非金属都处在铅和金刚石的界限之内。

sentences.english: Threshold inside, bunch English Fen Fang.
In ten years Sony sold 50 million units of the device.
sentences.chinese: 索尼公司在10年之内销售了五千万台沃克曼。

sentences.english: You may be accountable to complete projects to deadline and under budget.
sentences.chinese: 你可能要负责在期限之内以既定的预算完成各项任务。

sentences.english: And Father was embarked in one of his own warships within twenty minutes.
sentences.chinese: 父亲在二十分钟之内便跳上了他的一艘战舰。

sentences.english: Within the four seas all men are brothers.; All the people of the world are brothers.
When he picked up a harmonica, he learned to play it in hours.
sentences.chinese: 当他获得一只支口琴，在几小时之内就可以学会演奏。

sentences.english: Transfers are not permitted within 10 working days of the test.
sentences.chinese: 若在考前10个工作日之内，改期是不允许的。

sentences.english: The right song can change your outlook on life in under 45 seconds.
sentences.chinese: 合适的歌曲可以在45秒之内改变你对生活的看法。

sentences.english: All men are my brothers yet I am different from each .
sentences.chinese: 四海之内皆兄弟，可我是不同于他人的。

sentences.english: The vast majority of the world's most active volcanoes are within a few tens of kilometres of the coast (see map).
sentences.chinese: 世界上绝大多数活火山都在海岸线几十公里范围之内。

sentences.english: These clouds exist within the company firewall and they are managed by the enterprise.
sentences.chinese: 这些云在公司防火墙之内，由企业管理。

sentences.english: Deliver in-stock items within a few days.
sentences.chinese: 提供库存项目在几天之内。

sentences.english: Within hours of the news, you were calling in.
sentences.chinese: 在消息发布的几个小时之内你们召之即来。

definition: to exceed/to overstep/to go too far/to encroach
gap/interval/compartment/to divide/to separate/to leave a gap of (two weeks, three meters etc)
up to the maximum/upper limit/at most
